name: Midnight [DEMO]
description:
This is a demo of Midnight, the full game should take another year and a half to finish. 

SUMMARY

You follow Valerie Campbell, a curious college student visiting Hale, England to meet her best friend, Persephone Drake, for the first time in person. She knows going into this that Persi is in a family of witches, her particular passion being demonology, so it's no surprise when Persi offers to summon a demon with Val. But what happens when Val decides to summon someone by herself?

EXTRA

The demo is 1 hour long, with 11 possible choices to make, and several cgs.

The music and art are completely made myself (@MarsAstral on Twitter).  I'm making this game entirely myself due to finacial constraints. 

This takes place in a universe titled the Ethereal and will hopefully have many other games taking place within this particular universe. 

Please consider donating, and enjoy!
